website_summaries.verdict: Chic mule with a chunky heel makes a fashion statement.
pros: Padded sole offers good arch support
This style is very flattering on the feet
cons: Due to the high rise of the heel, they aren’t the most comfortable shoes

customer_reviews.title: YAS
customer_reviews.text: I took the advice of other rates and ordered half a size up and they fit perfect. Not good for a lot of walking and/or standing around as they aren't the most comfortable, but great for a dinner or work. They are incredibly adorable, and at a great price right now.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sandals, but should go a half size up ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandals, but should go a half size up or whole size. the width of the shoe is very narrow and arch is to tall and by the feel of it I didn't see myself wearing them for an 8 hour day.
customer_reviews.author: sweetorange

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have wide feet, boo... and these fit great all around. I cannot wear many sandals because of how narrow they are but these fit perfectly. The height is just how I like it, and they are comfortable. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: They look great, get tons of compliments whenever I wear them
customer_reviews.text: They look great, get tons of compliments whenever I wear them. Comfortable to wear for a couple hours though might get tired if i was wearing them all day.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fit OK
customer_reviews.text: Really love the look of these shoes, but beware, you have to have narrow feet to wear them. Agree with the comments with from the other reviewers. They are fairly comfortable and don't really rub anywhere. I have normal width feet and I'm hoping the leather stretches a little as they are very tight! I'm normally a 7-7.5 and I ordered a 7.5... Could have probably safely gone up to an 8 and been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Just not as comfortable by design
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Just not as comfortable by design. I find shoes/sandals with higher heels with a higher front wedge are more comfortable on my feet. These don't have that higher front wedge. :(
customer_reviews.author: Judeko

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty and good quality, but you have to buy one number extra. I can not use it because it's too small.
customer_reviews.author: Hans C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The mules look good on, have comfortable, padded soles. I liked everything about them but the height was killing my aged ankles, the heels are actually 4", had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpadoompa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but 1 full size too small just as any DV shoes.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommend purchasing 1/2 size up but otherwise I love it, it's so comfortable and appropriate for many dress styles!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly-Ann L Marrain

customer_reviews.title: ... working in retail I know that some tens fit like 9. 41 is really a US 10 but ...
customer_reviews.text: From working in retail I know that some tens fit like 9. 41 is really a US 10 but some will say it's 40. I had to give them to my sister who wore a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 8 was perfect. Love the style and fit
customer_reviews.text: If you're between sizes go up. I'm mostly a 7.5 and sometimes an 8. The 8 was perfect. Love the style and fit. Pretty comfortable for a higher heel.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but finicky shoe
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe. Dolce vita runs small and is super narrow so not perfect for everyone, but these are a unique, sophisticated way to get in on the mule trend.
customer_reviews.author: Kale Salad

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and chic shoes! The quality is great along with the price. They do run small though. Go a half size up
customer_reviews.author: Anna

product_meta.title: Dolce Vita Women's Odea Dress Sandal
product_meta.description: Launched in 2001, Dolce Vita's nonchalant attitude toward fashion resulted in footwear and clothing lines that are effortlessly stylish and delightfully flirty. By showcasing chic looks attributed to the label's very own modern muse-the young, restless, and the glamorous-Dolce Vita has developed an earnest following and is becoming a favorite everywhere.
feature_bullets: Block-heel sandal featuring slit straps and silver-tone hardware at vamp
